about_the_game:
Jump into Card Summoner, a single-player CCG adventure where the stakes are more than just cards. Travel through six summoner villages as you build your deck, earn Crests, and prove yourself in the Summoner's Tournament. Along the way, uncover a hidden threat that could endanger your world.

Story:

Your journey begins as a humble duelist eager to rise through the ranks, but whispers of a shadowy cult tied to the mysterious void cracks and vanishing summoners soon surface. As one of the most promising new players, you uncover a hidden power within yourself—one many believe could be the key to solving the Void crisis.

Gather your Cards, master your Decks, and confront the cult’s twisted schemes. The Grand Summoner's Tournament is more than a stage for champions, it’s the battleground for the fate of your realm.

Deck-Building and Card Collection:

Master the art of the cards with two specialized decks:

  • Dueling Deck: Build the tactical edge you need for tournaments and one-on-one battles.

  • Summoner Deck: Venture into the Void to fight monsters directly and capture them as cards!

Expand your collection through:

  • Booster Packs: Visit shops to open packs and discover rare and powerful cards.

  • Monster-Catching: Engage in summoner battles to turn Void monsters into unique cards.

  • Void Shop: Trade with mysterious creatures of the Void to uncover rare cards and discover new ways to expand your collection.

Every addition to your deck strengthens your strategy, sharpens your playstyle, and opens powerful combos to conquer both tournaments and Void battles alike.

  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or RX 480
